item.title: Competitive programming with python
item.description: Table Of Contents Why python for competitive programming🤷🏻‍♂️? Resources for CP with python:- Approach for solving a problem One important note📝 Common programming questions in challenges String manupalation:- Why python for competitive programming🤷🏻‍♂️? There are many programming languages with which one can approach to solve CP problems but in this blog we will focus on python and also some reasons why python can be a good choice for programming .

item.title: Solving Depth first search problem with Golang
item.description: Table Of Contents Let’s begin ✏ Golang solution 👨🏻‍💻 Conclusion So we will be solving a hackerrank problem on Graph Data structures to understand how to implement this kind of problems in golang by this blog we will understand maps, slices, recursion, global variables, for loops in golang. Also we will understand what is connected component in graph and how to use the logic to ace in these type of problems .

item.title: About
item.description: I am a passionate process driven web/backend developer 🚀 and do competitive programming sometimes trying to solve problems using logic helps to keep brain cells active and alert 👨‍💻 .I am going to join as Associate software engineer at Jeavio . I am adaptive to new technology stacks and fast learner . I love to read books and blogs 📘 during my free time and it ranges from tech 💻 to spirituality 🕉.
